      • getTag

        public java.lang.String getTag()

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        In onCreate, we gather all of the linearLayout's that are associated with each port. this is how the simple_device.xml file is reused, but we read and write to the correct Spinners, EditTexts, TextViews, and Buttons. The TextView port# is set during onCreate as a way to "name" that chunk of xml code. Each layout is then identified by the port number.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class EditActivity

      • clearDevice

        protected void clearDevice(android.view.View itemView)
        Sets device to a non-attached device (name "NO DEVICE ATTACHED" and name field grayed out). Removes the button if necessary.
